contents.main: Every day I become more sure that you're the one.
I would do anything, give anything just to see you smile. Why? Because I love you  :) x
Beauty without grace, is a body without a soul.
A sweeter smile and a brighter day. Hope everything turns out great for you Today!!
A fake smile can hide a million tears...
True love does not have a happy ending, but real Love lasts forever.
